thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1908
thread.title: Joe Gomez

author: Joe Gomez
title: Joe Gomez
text: Haven't seen my grandchildren in Seattle area for about a year. I received pictures and I didn't recognize them. 6, 5, and 3 years old, Immediately I began looking for cheap tickets. After about 6 days, approximately 8 hours per day of not being able to find a low RT fare to Seattle, I don't know how but I stumbled unto FlightHub. Boy! am I glad I did. I decided to arrive one-day early in order to take advantage of a fare I could afford. I saved over $100.00. Now Papa Joe can take them for a treat.
